description: Explore the world of atoms, molecules, and reactions. This foundational course covers the essential principles of chemistry, the science that connects everything.

lessons.title: Matter and Measurement
lessons.description: Properties of matter, physical vs chemical changes, and measurement

lessons.title: Atoms and Elements
lessons.description: Atomic theory, structure of atoms, and the periodic table

lessons.title: Bonding and Compounds
lessons.description: Ionic and covalent bonds, Lewis structures, and molecular shapes

lessons.title: Chemical Reactions
lessons.description: Types of reactions, balancing equations, and reaction rates

lessons.title: Stoichiometry: The Mole
lessons.description: The mole concept, molar mass, and quantitative calculations

lessons.title: Gases and Solutions
lessons.description: Gas laws, solution concentration, and colligative properties
